table.name: vtiger_ctwhatsapptemplates
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ctwhatsapptemplates` ( `ctwhatsapptemplatesid` int(19) NOT NULL, `wptemplate_title` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `wptemplate_msg` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `wptemplate_modules` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `wptemplate_fields` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `wptemplate_text` blob, `wptemplate_image` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `whatsapptemplates_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `wptemplate_scannumber` text, `wptemplate_quickaccess` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ctwhatsapptemplatesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_ctwhatsapptemplatescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ctwhatsapptemplatescf` ( `ctwhatsapptemplatesid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ctwhatsapptemplatesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
